org.spongepowered.api.event.block.tile

Interface FurnaceEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockEvent, BlockInventoryEvent, CauseTracked, Event, GameEvent, InventoryEvent, TileEntityEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FurnaceConsumeFuelEvent, FurnaceSmeltItemEvent

    public interface FurnaceEvent
extends TileEntityEvent, BlockInventoryEvent
    Represents an event that affects a tile entity with a Furnace data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FurnaceData getCurrentData()
      Gets the current DataManipulator associated with the TileEntity associated with this event.
      Furnace getFurnace()
      Gets the Furnace data that will be represented after the event.
